an3.97:1.1: “Tihi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato ranno bhadro assajaniyo rajaraho hoti rajabhoggo, ranno anganteva sankhayam gacchati.
an3.97:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno bhadro assajaniyo vannasampanno ca hoti balasampanno ca javasampanno ca.
an3.97:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi angehi samannagato ranno bhadro assajaniyo rajaraho hoti rajabhoggo, ranno anganteva sankhyam gacchati.
an3.97:1.5: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an3.97:1.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vannasampanno ca hoti balasampanno ca javasampanno ca.
an3.97:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silava hoti …pe… samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an3.97:2.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vannasampanno hoti.
an3.97:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
an3.97:3.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu balasampanno hoti.
an3.97:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatiko hoti tattha parinibbayi anavattidhammo tasma loka.
an3.97:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu javasampanno hoti.
an3.97:4.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa”ti.
